title: candra kalAvatam
sahitya:
candra kalAvatam samsEvEtam candrakalAvatam sam


anupallavi

  indra mukhAmara samstuta vaibhavam upEndra pitAmahA natacaraNam bhavam


caraNam    kAmadarbha haram kAla garvaharam thAmara sOdbhava shIrSa haram haram
bhUma balAntaka haram puraharam varam mAmaka mAnasa tAmasa dinakaram
